question: Comment est-il possible que je sois à 15% de body fat ?
reponse: Coconut oil contains medium-chain triglycerides (MCTs) that possess antimicrobial properties. These MCTs help neutralize odor-causing bacteria. Additionally, coconut oil acts as a smooth base for easy application.
